item.title: Data from: Density triggers maternal hormones that increase adaptive offspring growth in a wild mammal
item.description: Sources Background Effect of spruce cone availability on local density (Fig. 1B) Replication Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig. 3/Table S4) Replication Red flags one-tailed tests Forking paths Confounding Density and Treatment in Fig 3A,B/Table S4 What is effect of ignoring Chickadee manipulation in Fig 3C/Table S4 Summary of Red Flags for Figure 3/Table S4 Sources Dantzer, B., Newman, A.E., Boonstra, R., Palme, R.
